TopicTitle: Offering Explore Contracts Near Transfer Window

Articles.Content: While I was playing a Hard Career, I had a Explore Jool contract offered to me days away from the optimum transfer window. Very convenient when you play with life support and find yourself squeezing missions in-between station management. But I thought this might actually be quite helpful if done intentionally in the right circumstances. The concept simply is that newer players play less attention to/are less knowledgable of transfer windows. So by having the contract to explore a particular body offered closer to the transfer window based on difficulty setting, you can give less experienced players a better chance at going interplanetary efficiently. Sure, the contract might now not be offered as quickly in some cases, but the wait would be well made up for in economy and efficiency.
Or they could specify the most optimal and least dV transfer date.

Sounds like a good idea to me. And it does not need to be exact filter, just making those contracts a bit more likely to spawn would be enough. You know, not dumbing contracts down, just discreetely pushing them to be more relevant.
